snippet.title: "Mittelborg: City of Mages" Official Trailer
snippet.description:
It's strategic adventure with elements of roguelike and resource management. The scent of chaos hangs heavy in the air of Mittelborg. Does the magic have a future? Will depend on your decisions...  Find us on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/956060/Mittelborg_City_of_Mages/

P.S. We are close to the full release of the game,  join our channel https://discord.gg/Kzw9uC
all latest news about the game are brought to you there:)
